name: Inj3ct0r
tagline: Injects a 666 Virus. It's fake, obviously :P
body:
Well, hello there. You've somehow stumbled upon Inj3ct0r (CIXHacx). If you don't know what it is, it's simple.
It's a packed code for homebrew on 3DS. This is my second ever project, so cut me some slack if it isn't perfect.
Currently, it's on version v1.6! A lot of updates have been made since I FIRST released it, and then pulled it. 
But hey, if you wanna support me, Subscribe to my [YouTube Page](https://goo.gl/bTwX0Q).

If you don't know how to install this, Look below.

# INSTALLATION GUIDE
 
1. Pull out your 3DS's SD Card, and load it up on a computer.
2. Go to your "3DS" Folder on your SD card.
3. Drag the contents of the "3ds" folder you downloaded Inj3ct0r, and place them in there.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
